body_html:
It is the bug in tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_nsync.sh
need to override AR with android's AR ,
makefile='
AR := ${NDK_ROOT}/toolchains/'"$toolchain"'/prebuilt/'"$android_os_arch"'/bin/'"$bin_prefix"'-ar
CC=${CC_PREFIX}
${NDK_ROOT}/toolchains/'"$toolchain"'/prebuilt/'"$android_os_arch"'/bin/'"$bin_prefix"'-g++

body:
It is the bug in tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_nsync.sh
need to override AR with android's AR , 
 makefile='
                        AR := ${NDK_ROOT}/toolchains/'"$toolchain"'/prebuilt/'"$android_os_arch"'/bin/'"$bin_prefix"'-ar
                        CC=${CC_PREFIX} \
                           ${NDK_ROOT}/toolchains/'"$toolchain"'/prebuilt/'"$android_os_arch"'/bin/'"$bin_prefix"'-g++
